DOC.detailed_description: Background : Obstruction stenosis ilio-femoro-caval vein difficult treat conservative measure . Despite anticoagulation consequent use compression stocking , low extremity venous hypertension affect patient quality life health status cause venous claudication , swell , skin change , venous ulcer . In last decade venous stenting become accepted treatment ilio-femoro-caval obstruction . Recently , novel self-expanding nitinol stent specifically design venous system account anatomical structure ilio-femoro-caval vein . Gap Knowledge : There data short long term outcomes self-expanding Nitinol stent placement ilio-femoro-caval vein . Objective : To study patency rate clinical outcome data self-expanding Nitinol stent specifically design iliofemoral inferior vena cava residual thrombosis , obstruction stenosis .
DOC.criteria: Patients receive selfexpanding venous nitinol stent one follow indication : Residual thrombosis iliofemoral vein and/or inferior vena cava thrombus removal ( catheterdirected thrombolysis pharmacomechanical thrombolysis ) Postthrombotic syndrome chronic obstruction iliofemoral vein and/or inferior vena cava Chronic venous insufficiency presence nonthrombotic venous stenosis iliofemoral vein and/or inferior vena cava No consent Inability provide inform consent Allergy Nitinol Pregnancy , breastfeed birthgiving last 30 day Life expectancy < 3 month
